text:
AI is changing advertising. 

Here's how to create an ad in 5 steps:

1. Go to florafauna .ai 
2. Upload your product.
3. Ask it to create an image with your product.
4. Choose a video model.
5. Turn it into a video.

The best at mastering AI are not fancy "one-click-automation". This is not about being the fastest.

The best are:
☑ the ones using AI with taste,
☑ the ones generating 1,000+ versions,
☑ the ones picking the best 1 out of 1,000.

Be tasteful (with AI).
